Name: Weaver e-cology OA getdata.jsp sqli
Description: Fenwei ecology collaborative business office system has SQL injection vulnerabilities, which may cause data leakage and even server intrusion.
Author: 1291904552@qq.com
Impact: Fenwei ecology collaborative business office system has SQL injection vulnerabilities, which may cause data leakage and even server intrusion.
Recommendation:
The vendor has released a bug fix, please pay attention to the update in time: https://www.weaver.com.cn

1. Set access policies and whitelist access through security devices such as firewalls.

2.If not necessary, prohibit public network access to the system.

CN.Name: 泛微 ecology 协同商务办公系统 SQL 注入
CN.Description: 泛微ecology协同商务办公系统存在SQL注入漏洞，可能造成数据泄漏，甚至服务器被入侵。
CN.Impact: 泛微ecology协同商务办公系统存在SQL注入漏洞，攻击者除了可以利用 SQL 注入漏洞获取数据库中的信息（例如，管理员后台密码、站点的用户个人信息）之外，甚至在数据库权限足够的情况下可以向服务器中写入一句话木马，从而获取 webshell 或进一步获取服务器系统权限。
CN.Recommendation:
⼚商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：https://www.weaver.com.cn

1、通过防⽕墙等安全设备设置访问策略，设置⽩名单访问。

2、如⾮必要，禁⽌公⽹访问该系统。

EN.Recommendation:

1. Set access policies and whitelist access through security devices such as firewalls.

2.If not necessary, prohibit public network access to the system.

ExpParams.name: sqlQuery
ExpParams.value: select password as id from HrmResourceManager
